member.name: IStdMarshalInfo.GetClassForHandler
member.summary: Retrieves the CLSID of the object handler to be used in the destination process during standard marshaling.
member.param: The destination context, that is, the process in which the unmarshaling will be done. Possible values are taken from the enumeration .
A pointer to the handler's CLSID.
member.returns: This method can return the standard return values E_INVALIDARG, E_OUTOFMEMORY, E_UNEXPECTED, and S_OK.

member.name: IStdMarshalInfo
member.summary: Retrieves the CLSID identifying the handler to be used in the destination process during standard marshaling.
